rows.label: qst000505_msg0001
rows.name:
Ah, yes, I'm Riana's brother.
Has something happened?

rows.label: qst000505_msg0002
rows.name:
I see... So they decided
to elope after all...

rows.label: qst000505_msg0003
rows.name:
I'd be happy to make the
medicine, but is eloping
really their only option...?

rows.label: qst000505_msg0004
rows.name:
I just want my sister to be happy,
but I can't believe that running
away is the best choice for her...

rows.label: qst000505_msg0006
rows.name:
Hey, could I ask a favor
of you all as well?

rows.label: qst000505_msg0007
rows.name:
While I'm making the medicine,
could you go to my parents' house
and hear what they have to say?

rows.label: qst000505_msg0008
rows.name:
I'd like to go myself,
but I've been disowned.

rows.label: qst000505_msg0009
rows.name:
If I were to go, it might just
make things more complicated.

rows.label: qst000505_msg0010
rows.name: My father is more stubborn than a rock.

rows.label: qst000505_msg0011
rows.name:
My mother isn't quite as bad,
but she basically sides with
my father on everything...

rows.label: qst000505_msg0012
rows.name:
Thank you! Their house is in
the Grodd Residential Zone.

rows.label: qst000505_msg0013
rows.name:
I'll leave it to you, then.
I'll have the medicine finished
by the time you get back.

rows.label: qst000505_msg0101
rows.name:
My stubborn parents live in
the Grodd Residential Zone.

rows.label: qst000505_msg0102
rows.name:
Please go and hear them out. I'll
finish the medicine in the meantime.

rows.label: qst000505_msg0201
rows.name: Welcome back. The medicine is ready.

rows.label: qst000505_msg0202
rows.name: So, what did Father and the others say?

rows.label: qst000505_msg0203
rows.name: I see... Still as stubborn as ever...

rows.label: qst000505_msg0204
rows.name:
I suppose it's because they
worry about their children
more than anything...

rows.label: qst000505_msg0205
rows.name: What's the right thing to do here...?

rows.label: qst000505_msg0206
rows.name:
It's not like we can see
the future. Nobody knows.

rows.label: qst000505_msg0207
rows.name:
...Right, but more importantly,
please get this medicine to
Riana and the others quickly.

rows.label: qst000505_msg0208
rows.name:
Riana will know what to
do. I'm counting on you.

rows.label: qst000505_msg0301
rows.name:
Please get this medicine to Riana and
the others. I'm counting on you.
